thread.title: Bernie Madoff’s Former Beach House to List for $21 Million

author: Katherine Clarke
title: Bernie Madoff’s Former Beach House to List for $21 Million
text:
A Montauk, N.Y., beach house formerly owned by disgraced financier Bernard Madoff is coming on the market for $21 million.
The current owners, real-estate titan Steven Roth and his wife, Daryl, a theater producer, bought the property for $9.41 million in 2009, records show. The proceeds of the sale, which was handled by the U.S. Marshals Service, went toward restitution for the victims of Mr. Madoff’s notorious Ponzi scheme.
